summary: A detective of the paranormal slowly unravels mysterious events with deadly results.
cast: Christian Slater|Tara Reid|Stephen Dorff|Frank C. Turner|Matthew Walker|Will Sanderson|Mark Acheson|Darren Shahlavi|Karin Konoval|Craig Bruhnanski|Kwesi Ameyaw|Dustyn Arthurs|Catherine Lough Haggquist|Ed Anders|Brad Turner|Michael P. Northey|Malcolm Scott|Ryan Drescher|Sean Campbell|Sarah Deakins|Daniel Cudmore|Françoise Yip|Ho-Sung Pak|Mike Dopud|Brendan Fletcher|Donna Lysell|Ona Grauer|John Fallon|Rebekah Postey|Robert Bruce|Dean Redman|Antonio Maiurano|Marc Natoli|John Ulmer
title: Alone in the Dark
